title: 这块怎么翻译
author: PaulWong
txt_content:
[size=14.6667px]
How to Install​
Download the OpRemover.jar file.Drag and drop it on your plugins folder.Restart your server.Done!
[size=14.6667px]How to use​
Open the plugin folderOpen the config.ymlEdit the PlayerName and change it for the Op Players you want to remove the Op after leaving the server.Go to the game and run the command /opremover reload to reload the config.yml fileDone!
[size=14.6667px]

[size=14.6667px]

[size=14.6667px]

@PercyDan qq回我怎么办[size=14.6667px]
